title: Spicy quinoa with black beans and sweetcorn
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '3 jalapeno chilli peppers, seeded and finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '300ml vegetable stock', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes with juice', '175g quinoa', '175g frozen sweetcorn', '1/2 teaspoon coarse sea salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1/4 lime, juiced']
